Select View or Edit

Use the Select View or Edit dialog box to get (view) or check out (edit) a revision. Serena ChangeMan Version Manager opens the workfile in the application associated with the versioned file.

You can set the application associated with the versioned file using the Applications tab in View | Options. For Windows, the default Windows-associated application is used.

Field Descriptions

View Select to get a copy of the revision. The Get dialog box displays by default; if you typically get the default revision, you can bypass the Get dialog box by deselecting the Get/View check box under the View | Options | Dialog Behavior tab.
On UNIX, the temp directory where the read-only file is created when you view a file is defined by the location of the vmc script (the default is /tmp). On Windows, the file is placed in the temp directory defined for your workstation.
Edit Select to check out the revision. The Check Out dialog box displays by default; if you typically check out the default revision, you can bypass this dialog by deselecting the Check Out/Edit check box under the View | Options | Dialog Behavior tab.
